climbs.name: Spiegel's Arete
climbs.fa: maybe Nolan Robertson? Or if not Jeremy May

content.description:
Sit start, and climb the arete left of

Radical Left

.
content.location:
It ascends the left arete of the north est corner of the largest boulder left of

Radical Left

.

content.description:
Sit start on obvious holds just right of the shallow, left-facing corner on the slightly overhanging west face of the largest boulder in the corridor. Move left into the corner, then continue left then up.

The person that told me how to find this climb said that Nolan Robertson put it up and that it was V6. I do not disagree.
content.location: It is on the west face of the largest boulder in the corridor between the two boulders.

content.description: Sit start on the left edge of the low, north-facing overhang. Follow the easy lip traverse right to the mental crux. It is low with a good landing. This is not a glorious problem IMO.
content.location:
It is on the north-facing side of Minston's Play House left of

Radical Left

.
